mng: guzheng or long zither, long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times, Japanese koto

exm.mng: zither or guzheng, large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
a kite with cut string (idiom); fig. gone beyond recall
